title: How to get my driving license if lost and I dont have driving license number - Quora

response.answer_text: Obtaining the duplicate driving license is pretty simple. In case you do not have the driving license number and validity details follow the following steps, If you have these details directly jump to step number 3 Write an application to MLO of of your issuing Transport authority to get the DL-Extract. Mention your Name, D.O.B. and address on the application and get it signed by LMLO or MLO.Submit Rs.50 and get the receipt for the same, go to the Data Entry counter. After that they will redirect you again to LMLO where you will get your DL-Extract.Take following documents to LMLO:1. Form no. 12. L.L.D. form with photo affixed3. Copy of FIR with license number on it4. An address proofHe will sign the documents and ask you to deposit the fees of Rs. 400 to get the duplicate License.

Go down to your local Driver’s License Office and get a replacement license. They don’t need your current one to give you a replacement one. If you paid things in the recent past by check, look on the back of your cashed check and your license number should have been written out by the clerk taking your check. In many states in the US, you can google <State Name> License Generator. Go to the link and answer the questions. A few states don’t do this, so its not 100%.
